meanings: (부딪치거나 맞지 않도록) avoid, dodge, sidestep; (고개를 숙여) duck (down)
(곤란한 일·상황 등을) avoid, escape, duck, (informal) sidestep, get around; (교묘하게) dodge; (책임을) evade, shirk

vlive.korean: 여러분들은 날씨 더워졌을 때 피하는 방법 있어요? Is there a way you avoid hot weather? 듣기 View video NCT : 런쥔이왔어요!!!💚
vlive.english: Is there a way you avoid hot weather?

vlive.korean: 느낌 있어요 - 카메라 피하는 거 봤어요 방금? Yes, he is. - Did you just see him avoiding the camera? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#574. 오마이갓세븐 (스페셜 DJ 갓세븐 JB&영재 with 갓세븐)
vlive.english: Yes, he is. - Did you just see him avoiding the camera?

vlive.korean: 저도... 왜 저 피하는 것 같죠? Me too... Why does it seem you are avoiding me? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : IZ*ONE 에너지 캠 플러스(ENOZI Cam +) 아이즈원, 태국 마트에 가다!
vlive.english: Me too... Why does it seem you are avoiding me?

vlive.korean: 설마 옮을까 봐 피하는 거냐? Are you avoiding me because you might get the flu? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 이하림 걸크러시 모음.zip [인서울] - 5,6 하이라이트
vlive.english: Are you avoiding me because you might get the flu?

vlive.korean: [벌칙을 피하는 것은 높은 계단을 오르는 것과 같지만...] [Trying to avoid a penalty is like climbing really steep stairs...] View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.90
vlive.english: [Trying to avoid a penalty is like climbing really steep stairs...]

examples.korean: an actor who shuns publicity 발음듣기 세상의 관심을 피하는 배우 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an actor who shuns publicity 발음

examples.korean: two people avoiding eye contact 발음듣기 서로 시선 마주치는 걸 피하는 두 사람 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: two people avoiding eye contact 발음

examples.korean: He tends to avoid all physical contact. 발음듣기 그는 모든 신체 접촉을 피하는 경향이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He tends to avoid all physical contact. 발음

examples.korean: Hugh never shied away from his responsibilities. 발음듣기 휴는 자기 책무를 피하는 법이 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hugh never shied away from his responsibilities. 발음

examples.korean: The Teflon Prime Minister has survived another crisis. 발음듣기 타격을 잘도 피하는 수상이 또 한 번의 위기에서도 살아남았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Teflon Prime Minister has survived another crisis. 발음
